item.title: Queens Of The Stone Age - Go With The Flow
item.description:
Hey! Check my awesome stuff for merch at https://www.redbubble.com/people/Ukeledu/shop
-
¡Hey! Échale un ojo a mis molones artículos de merchan en https://www.redbubble.com/es/people/Ukeledu/shop
________________________
STRUMMING PATTERN / RASGUEO:
Verse / Verso: DUDUDUDU Chorus / Estribillo: DUDUDUxx DUDUDUxx DUDUDUDUDUDUDUDU
D: Down / Hacia abajo U: Up / Hacia arriba x: Muted strigs (Down) / Cuerdas muteadas con la palma de la mano (hacia abajo)
________________________
Hey! If you liked this video, give me a like, subscribe and comment your doubts, suggestions or anything you want.
- ¡Hey! Si te ha gustado el vídeo, dame like, suscríbete y comenta tus dudas, sugerencias o lo que te apetezca.
_________________________
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ukeledu/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ukeledu.music/

item.title: Francesca Battistelli - Heaven Everywhere
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: C, C6, Cmaj7, F, G, Am7, Am
As performed by Francesca Battistelli
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pH-GE0UeO9A
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at:
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”

item.title: Rockin Roary - All I Want For Christmas - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas Easy
All I Want For Christmas Is My two front Teeth Written by Don Gardener
Using the chords: Am C D7 E7 F G7
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
